info.name: Olfactory stria
info.description: The olfactory tract extends to the brain from the olfactory bulb.  At the brain, the olfactory tract divides into the lateral and medial olfactory stria. The lateral olfactory stria travels across the lateral aspect of the anterior perforated substance and then bends medially toward the uncus.  The medial olfactory stria turns medially behind the paraolfactory area and ends in the subcallosal gyrus.
